power.frostburnorigins.flaming_body.name: Flaming Body
power.frostburnorigins.flaming_body.desc: Your body is so hot that you set fire to any mob you touch.
power.frostburnorigins.blazeborn.name: Blazeborn
power.frostburnorigins.blazeborn.descrip: Fellow Blazings do not attack you.
power.frostburnorigins.phoenix.name: Phoenix
power.frostburnorigins.phoenix.descripti: Resist death due to your fiery spirit.
power.frostburnorigins.fall_flying.name: Refractive Wings
power.frostburnorigins.fall_flying.descr: You can utilize the heat of your body to slice through the air, achieving flight.
power.frostburnorigins.kings_shield.name: King's Shield
power.frostburnorigins.kings_shield.desc: Create a shield around yourself, temporarily forged from your own burning limbs.
power.frostburnorigins.thermophobic.name: Thermophobic
power.frostburnorigins.thermophobic.desc: You cannot consume hot food, such as magma cream, or blaze rods.
power.frostburnorigins.endless_quiver.de: You store a quiver that has an endless amount of arrows.
power.frostburnorigins.frostbite.name: Frostbite
power.frostburnorigins.frostbite.descrip: Attacking an entity deals Slowness for 4 seconds.
power.frostburnorigins.hypothermicbite.d: Attacking an entity deals Slowness II for 8 seconds.
power.frostburnorigins.frozen_heart.name: Frozen Heart
power.frostburnorigins.frozen_heart.desc: Members of the Frost Faction are neutral towards you.
You get more value from rotting food, and are immune to hunger, wither, and poison effects.
power.frostburnorigins.brethren.name: Brethren
power.frostburnorigins.brethren.descript: Members of the Illagers do not attack you.
power.frostburnorigins.axe_crazy.name: Axe Crazy
power.frostburnorigins.fang_caller.name: Fang Caller
power.frostburnorigins.wrought_iron.name: Wrought Iron
power.frostburnorigins.wrought_iron.desc: Your body is hard as iron, giving you 5 extra Hearts.
power.frostburnorigins.crackable.name: Crackable
